content.query:
-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

--1a. perform join on individual, family and family membership
SELECT 
    i.*, fm.*, f.*
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family);



--2a. total number of records after the join operation 
SELECT 
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family);


-- 3a. count how many individuals/family were assigned a primart contact
SELECT
    f.primary_contact,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY totals DESC;


-- 3b. remove the null values
SELECT
    f.primary_contact,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE f.primary_contact IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY totals DESC;



--3c how many distinct counts of individuals/family assignets to primart contacts
SELECT
    DISTINCT(COUNT(1)) AS primary_contact_assi
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE f.primary_contact IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY f.primary_contact
ORDER BY primary_contact_assi DESC;


--4a. how many individuals belong to each family relationship
--*****Qn: where is the dict for (family_relationship)
SELECT
    fm.family_relationship,
    COUNT(1) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
WHERE fm.family_relationship IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY fm.family_relationship
ORDER BY totals DESC;
